verses.verse: Now the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> more <S%H6175>subtle<s%> than any <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>made.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H637>"Has<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> really <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall not eat of any <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden?<s%>'"
The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> "Of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> we may <S%H398>eat,<s%>

but of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> which is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall not eat of <S%H5060>it,<s%> neither shall you touch <S%H6435>it,<s%> lest you <S%H4191>die.<s%>'"
The <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> "You <S%H4191>won't<s%> surely <S%H4191>die,<s%>

for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5869>it,<s%> your eyes will be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and you will be like <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3045>knowing<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil.<s%>"

When the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> and that <S%H1931>it<s%> was a <S%H8378>delight<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and that the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> to make one <S%H7919>wise,<s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> of <S%H6529>its<s%> <S%H398>fruit,<s%> and ate; and she <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1571>some<s%> to her <S%H376>husband<s%> with <S%H398>her,<s%> and he ate.

The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H8147>both<s%> of them were <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were <S%H5903>naked.<s%> They <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H5929>leaves<s%> <S%H8609>together,<s%> and made <S%H6213>themselves<s%> <S%H2290>aprons.<s%>

They <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> in the <S%H7307>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> hid <S%H2244>themselves<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H335>him,<s%> "Where are you?"

The man <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and I was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> because <S%H595>I<s%> was <S%H5903>naked;<s%> and I hid <S%H2244>myself.<s%>"

God <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who <S%H5046>told<s%> you that you were <S%H5903>naked?<s%> Have you <S%H398>eaten<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree<s%> that I commanded you <S%H1115>not<s%> to eat <S%H398>from?<s%>"

The <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H802>woman<s%> whom you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to be with <S%H5978>me,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H398>me<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and I ate."

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> "What is this you have <S%H6213>done?<s%>" The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5175>serpent<s%> deceived <S%H5377>me,<s%> and I <S%H398>ate.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> "Because <S%H859>you<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H779>this,<s%> you are cursed above all <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and above every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> On your <S%H1512>belly<s%> you shall <S%H3212>go,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> dust all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>

I will <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%> between you and the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and between your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> and her <S%H2233>offspring.<s%> He will <S%H7779>bruise<s%> your <S%H7218>head,<s%> and you will <S%H7779>bruise<s%> his <S%H6119>heel.<s%>"

To the <S%H802>woman<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7235>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your pain in <S%H2032>childbirth.<s%> In <S%H6089>pain<s%> you will <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%> Your <S%H8669>desire<s%> will be for your <S%H376>husband,<s%> and he will rule over <S%H4910>you.<s%>"

To <S%H121>Adam<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because you have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to your <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and have <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I commanded <S%H6680>you,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall not eat of <S%H779>it,<s%>' cursed is the <S%H127>ground<s%> for your <S%H6093>sake.<s%> In toil you will <S%H398>eat<s%> of it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>
It will <S%H6779>yield<s%> <S%H6975>thorns<s%> and <S%H1863>thistles<s%> to <S%H398>you;<s%> and you will eat the <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

By the <S%H2188>sweat<s%> of your <S%H639>face<s%> will you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> until you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H127>ground,<s%> for out of it you were <S%H3947>taken.<s%> For you are <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and to dust you shall <S%H7725>return.<s%>"
The <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H802>his<s%> <S%H8034>wife<s%> <S%H2332>Eve,<s%> because she was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of all <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> of <S%H5785>skins<s%> for <S%H120>Adam<s%> and for his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and clothed <S%H3847>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> has become like <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3045>us,<s%> knowing <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil.<s%> <S%H7971>Now,<s%> lest he reach out his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and also <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H2425>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>.."

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> sent him out <S%H7971>from<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> from which he was <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

So he drove <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H120>man;<s%> and he <S%H7931>placed<s%> <S%H5731>Cherubs<s%> at the <S%H6924>east<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> and the <S%H3858>flame<s%> of a <S%H2719>sword<s%> which turned every <S%H2015>way,<s%> to <S%H8104>guard<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
